rev.desc.rev.desc: Denying a Change Management Subscription category record halts the workflow
add judgement condition that if the change is rejected directly when the subscription is in "Requested" status and the subscripton's status change to "Denied"

descript.descript: Denying a Change Management Subscription category record halts the workflow
add judgement condition that if the change is rejected directly when the subscription is in "Requested" status and the subscripton's status change to "Denied"
Removed call to am.decice.down, now called by post trigger.
Added call to am.decide.down to correctly set the is.down flag.
Modified to remove setting closed flag.
will now pass whether or not the outage is closed into the background processor (needed for expenseline processing)
Now uses counters rather than a call to the RAD getnumb to fetch an outage ID
Will now NOT post a detail expansion record if the object described in the outage has no SLAs associated with it.
Will now place a description of the SLA outage rollup record into the "name" field rather than the description field of the schedule
Will now properly set the "has.sla" flag when a new outage is posted.
